support.caption: We are here to answer your {pillar}-related queries.

drawdownSurveyCta.title: Your feedback is important to us
drawdownSurveyCta.subtitle: Please let us know your thoughts

drawdownSurveyScreen.title: Your feedback is invaluable to us

usageReason.question: Why did you use Earned Wage Access?

idealFreq.question: What is your ideal pay frequency?

moreFeedback.question: Would you like to provide more feedback later?

whatPayIsEligible.title: What pay is eligible?
whatPayIsEligible.content: You are eligible to access 50% of your unpaid net pay owed using earned wage access.There is a maximum withdrawal limit of {withdrawalMaxLimit} per week.

howAreFundsDeducted.title: How are funds deducted?
howAreFundsDeducted.content1: Earned Wage Access Now transactions in a given pay period will be deducted from your payslip in that pay period's pay run.
howAreFundsDeducted.content2: You will see the transaction reflected on your payslip as a deduction, with a corresponding reference number in your Earned Wage Access Now history.

howAreFundsCalculated.title: How are funds calculated?
howAreFundsCalculated.content1: Earned Wage Access Now 'Available funds' shows 50% of an estimated total amount of money eligible for withdrawal. This total amount is calculated based on the amount of time you have worked - but have not yet been paid for - in the current pay period.
howAreFundsCalculated.content2: For salaried employees, InstaPay Now 'Available funds' shows 50% of a proportion of your salary eligible for withdrawal. This proportion is calculated based on the total number of days you have worked in the current pay period.

whatAreTheFees.title: What are the fees?
whatAreTheFees.content: A 1% fee is charged per transaction.

whenWillIReceiveMyFunds.title: When will I receive my funds?
whenWillIReceiveMyFunds.content: You will typically receive your funds within 1-2 hours depending on your bank.
